name: part_007
file: tmp_【公式】3Dアニメ『魔法少女ホロウィッチ！THE STAGE 〜TRICK or MAGIC！〜』本編 [_qpO8vi9fpA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Continuation and conclusion of the performance of 'RPG' by Sakura Miko, Shirakami Fubuki, Yukihana Lamy, Himemori Luna, and Houshou Marine.
MC section after the first song. The performers thank the audience and interact with them. A crowd chant for an encore begins, leading into the final song.
Performance of the encore song 'Hajimari no Mahou -charm-'. Murasaki Shion joins the stage for this full group performance.

subtitles.original: 空は青く澄み渡り…
subtitles.english: The sky is clear and blue...

subtitles.original: 海を目指して歩く
subtitles.english: Walking toward the sea

subtitles.original: 怖いものなんてない
subtitles.english: There's nothing to be afraid of

subtitles.original: 僕らはもう一人じゃない
subtitles.english: We are no longer alone

subtitles.original: 空は青く澄み渡り…
subtitles.english: The sky is clear and blue...

subtitles.original: 海を目指して歩く
subtitles.english: Walking toward the sea

subtitles.original: 怖くても大丈夫
subtitles.english: It's okay to be afraid

subtitles.original: 僕らはもう一人じゃない
subtitles.english: We are no longer alone

subtitles.original: みんな、今日はありがとう！
subtitles.english: Everyone, thank you for today!

subtitles.original: 最高に楽しいハロウィンだったよね、みんな！
subtitles.english: It was the best Halloween ever, right everyone?

subtitles.original: ちょっとアクシデントもあったけどさ、そういうのも含めて、
subtitles.english: There were some accidents too, but including that...

subtitles.original: いいお宝… いい思い出になったんじゃない？
subtitles.english: ...wasn't it a great treasure... a great memory?

subtitles.original: さて、そろそろお時間となって参りましたが…
subtitles.english: Now, it's almost time to say goodbye, but...

subtitles.original: アンコール！ アンコール！
subtitles.english: Encore! Encore!

subtitles.original: それじゃあアンコールにお答えして、
subtitles.english: Well then, in response to the encore,

subtitles.original: この曲歌っちゃうのら！
subtitles.english: Let's sing this song!

subtitles.original: はじまりの魔法-charm-
subtitles.english: The Beginning of Magic -charm-

subtitles.original:
はじまりの魔法-charm-
作詞・作曲・編曲：三好啓太
subtitles.english:
The Beginning of Magic -charm-
Lyrics, Composition, Arrangement: Keita Miyoshi

subtitles.original: 君に魔法をかけるよ ミケセルオマジ
subtitles.english: I'll cast a spell on you, Miketseru Omaji

subtitles.original: 始まりを告げる
subtitles.english: Announcing the beginning

subtitles.original: 衝動が響く
subtitles.english: The impulse resounds

subtitles.original: 気づいた時がいつだってスタートラインなんだ
subtitles.english: Whenever you notice it, that's your starting line

subtitles.original: 何者でもなかった
subtitles.english: Who used to be nobody

subtitles.original: 君を変えたのは
subtitles.english: What changed you was

subtitles.original: 見つけたばかりのちっぽけな輝きの原石
subtitles.english: A tiny rough diamond of radiance you just found

subtitles.original: どうして私だけ上手くいかないんだろう
subtitles.english: Why am I the only one who can't do things right?

subtitles.original: 自分以外のすべてが眩しく見えるけど
subtitles.english: Everything except myself looks dazzling

subtitles.original: ねぇ 君に見つけてほしくて
subtitles.english: Hey, I wanted you to find me

subtitles.original: なりたい私になる 今こそ
subtitles.english: I'll become who I want to be, starting now

subtitles.original: そうさ 叶えたい 掴みたい 夢があるから
subtitles.english: Yes, because I have a dream I want to fulfill and grasp

subtitles.original: 塞ぎ込んだ昨日ごと連れて踏み出すんだ
subtitles.english: I'll take all my gloomy yesterdays and step forward

subtitles.original: 信じる力が奇跡を起こすように
subtitles.english: So the power of belief can work a miracle

subtitles.original: 君に魔法をかけるよ ミケセルオマジ
subtitles.english: I'll cast a spell on you, Miketseru Omaji

subtitles.original: 数多の望み
subtitles.english: Countless hopes

subtitles.original: 叶わない願い
subtitles.english: Unfulfilled wishes

subtitles.original: それぞれが等しく 混ざり合ってく世界で
subtitles.english: In a world where they all blend together equally

subtitles.original: 何を求めて 歩き続けるんだろう
subtitles.english: What are we searching for as we keep walking?

subtitles.original: いつまでこの場所に迷うけど
subtitles.english: We get lost in this place forever, but

subtitles.original: 君がくれたこの空が
subtitles.english: This sky that you gave me

subtitles.original: 癒えない翼をくれたね
subtitles.english: Gave me wings that will never fail

subtitles.original: そうさ 照らしたい 届けたい 人がいるから
subtitles.english: Yes, because there's someone I want to shine for, to reach

subtitles.original: もう一人置いていったりしないと決めたんだ
subtitles.english: I've decided not to leave anyone alone anymore

subtitles.original: 愛したい 応えたい 自分自身の意思
subtitles.english: I want to love, I want to respond, by my own will

subtitles.original: 正解なんてこれでいい 見たい景色を背に
subtitles.english: This is the right answer, with the view I want to see behind me

subtitles.original: どんな場所でもいいよ
subtitles.english: Any place is fine

subtitles.original: どんな姿でもいい
subtitles.english: Any form is fine

subtitles.original: 追いかけたいんだ あの煌めきを
subtitles.english: I want to chase after that sparkle

subtitles.original: 希望 光 力 連れて 抱きしめて持っていこう
subtitles.english: Taking hope, light, and power, let's embrace them and go

subtitles.original: ほら 繋げたい 広げたい 道があるから
subtitles.english: Look, because there's a path I want to connect and expand

subtitles.original: ここから始まる物語 一緒に歩こう
subtitles.english: Let's walk together in the story that begins here

subtitles.original: 信じる力が奇跡を起こすように
subtitles.english: So the power of belief can work a miracle

subtitles.original: この…
subtitles.english: This...
